moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Gather Generic File Collection
moduleMetadataJson.description: This module downloads files recursively based on the FILE_GLOBS option.
author: 3vi1john <Jbabio@me.com>
RageLtMan <rageltman@sempervictus>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: SEARCH_FROM
options.description: Search from a specific location. Ex. C:\

options.name: FILE_GLOBS
options.description: The file pattern to search for in a filename
